name: tm09
effect: Teaches Bullet Seed to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Venoshock to a compatible Pokémon. (Gen IV & III: Bullet Seed Gen II: Psych Up Gen I: Take Down)

flavor_text.black_white: The user drenches the target in a special poisonous liquid. Its power is doubled if the target is poisoned.
flavor_text.black_2_white_2: The user drenches the target in a special poisonous liquid. Its power is doubled if the target is poisoned.
